text: Naadaan kehte hain ke Allah khud humse baat kyun nahin karta ya koi nishani hamare paas kyun nahin aati? Aisi hi baatein inse pehle log bhi kiya karte thay , in sab (agle pichle gumraahon) ki zehniyatein (mentality) ek jaisi hain. Yakeen laney walon ke liye to hum nishaniyan saaf saaf numayan kar chuke hain
